Title: Losing the Light
Plot: While Lara is vacationing in Paris, oblivious, Dana's condition takes a turn for the worse. Alice runs into Dana's ex, Jenny introduces Max to a man from her past, Carmen evens the score with Shane, and Peggy Peabody flies to town to help her daughter. Frustrated, Bette leaves the Buddhist retreat but receives a dose of life wisdom from an unexpected source.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Sonya Anand,  Lorena Gale,  Derek James,  Evan Adams,  Claudette Mink,  Peter Wingfield,  David Lovgren,  Kwesi Ameyaw,  Georgia Craig,  Callum Keith Rennie,  Steven Eckholdt,  Alexandra Hedison,  Ryan Robbins,
